languages.text: "Сестра Арджента!" {n}Голос сенешаля, кажется, выводит воительницу из боевого транса.{/n} "Сестра Арджента, рад видеть вас. Нам нужны все силы, какие мы сможем собрать!"

traits.locale_text: "Сестра Арджента!" {n}В голосе Сенешаля звучат командные нотки — кажется, они выводят воительницу из боевого транса.{/n} "Сестра Арджента, рад видеть, что вы в добром здравии и при оружии. Нам нужны все силы, какие мы сможем собрать!"

languages.text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента!" {n}Голос сенешаля, кажется, выводит воительницу из боевого транса.{/n} "Сестра Арджента, рад видеть вас. Нам нужны все силы, какие мы сможем собрать!"

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice is commanding, and it seems to have taken the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you in good health and well armed. We require all the forces we can muster!"

"Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice is commanding, and it seems to have taken the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you in good health and well armed. We require all the forces we can muster!"

"Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice carries the weight of a command, and it seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you in good health and well armed. We require all the forces we can muster!"

"Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice carries the weight of a command, and it seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you in good health and well armed. We require all the forces we can muster!"
"Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女！”{n}总领的声音将阿洁塔修女从战斗的恍惚中拉了出来。{/n}“阿洁塔修女，见到你很让人欣慰。我们需要召集一切可以召集的力量！”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女！”{n}总领的声音带着命令的意味，将阿洁塔修女从战斗的恍惚中拉了出来。{/n}“阿洁塔修女，我很欣慰看到你身体健康、全副武装。我们需要召集一切可以召集的力量！”

languages.text: «¡Hermana Argenta!». {n}La voz del Senescal parece bastar para sacar a la guerrera de su trance de batalla.{/n} «Hermana Argenta, es un alivio verla. ¡Necesitamos todas las fuerzas que podamos reunir!».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Hermana Argenta!». {n}La voz del Senescal lleva el peso de una orden, y eso parece bastar para sacar a la guerrera de su trance de batalla.{/n} «Hermana Argenta, es un alivio verla en buena salud y bien armada. ¡Necesitamos todas las fuerzas que podamos reunir!».

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ！」{n}家令長の声は、彼女を戦闘のトランス状態から目覚めさせたようだ。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタ、お会いできて安心しました。我々には召喚できるすべての戦力が必要です！」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ！」{n}家令長の声は命令のような重さがあり、彼女を戦闘のトランスから目覚めさせるようだ。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタ、あなたが無事で十分な装備を持っていることを見て安心しました。我々には召喚できるすべての戦力が必要だ！」
「シスター・アルジェンタ！」{n}家令長の声は、彼女を戦闘のトランス状態から目覚めさせたようだ。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタ、お会いできて安心しました。我々には召喚できるすべての戦力が必要です！」

languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

languages.text: « Sœur Argenta ! » {n}La voix du sénéchal semble faire sortir la guerrière de sa transe pugnace.{/n} « Sœur Argenta, quel soulagement de vous voir Nous avons besoin de toutes les forces possibles ! »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

traits.locale_text: « Sœur Argenta ! » {n}La voix du sénéchal résonne avec tout le poids d'un ordre, ce qui semble faire sortir la guerrière de sa transe pugnace.{/n} « Sœur Argenta, quel soulagement de vous voir indemne et bien armée. Nous avons besoin de toutes les forces possibles ! »

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta!" {n}Die Stimme des Truchsess scheint die Kriegerin aus ihrer Kampftrance zu holen.{/n} "Schwester Argenta, es ist eine Erleichterung, Euch zu sehen. Wir brauchen alle Kräfte, die wir finden!"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta!" {n}Die Stimme des Truchsess hat Befehlston und scheint die Kriegerin aus ihrer Kampftrance zu holen.{/n} "Schwester Argenta, es ist eine Erleichterung, Euch bei guter Gesundheit und bewaffnet zu sehen. Wir brauchen alle Kräfte, die wir finden!"

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta!" {n}Seneşal'in sesi, savaşın büyüsüne kapılmış savaşçıyı kendine getiriyor.{/n} "Rahibe Argenta, seni görmek içime su serpti. Şu an elimizdeki tüm kuvvetlere ihtiyacımız var!"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta!" {n}The Seneschal's voice seems to bring the warrior out of her battle trance.{/n} "Sister Argenta, it is a relief to see you. We require all the forces we can muster!"

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta!" {n}Seneşal'in sesi, savaşın büyüsüne kapılmış savaşçıyı kendine getiriyor.{/n} "Rahibe Argenta, seni görmek içime su serpti. Şu an elimizdeki tüm kuvvetlere ihtiyacımız var!"
